===Etymology===

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|だくてん|acc=3|acc2=h|acc_ref=NHK,DJR|acc2_ref=NHK,DJR|y=go|dev=2}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|kyu=濁點|だくてん}}

# [[voice|voicing]] mark: the mark added to {{ja-r|か}} to produce {{ja-r|が}}.

* {{ja-r|濁り|にごり}}, {{ja-r|濁り点|にごりてん}}
* {{ja-r|点々|てんてん}}, {{ja-r|ちょんちょん}} {{qualifier|colloquial}}
